sentences.sentence: They have fifty thousand troops along the border ready to repel any attack.
sentences.translation: 他们沿边界有5万军队，随时准备击退任何进攻。

sentences.sentence: Ants store food, repel attackers and use chemical signals to contact one another in case of attack.
sentences.translation: 蚂蚁储存食物，击退攻击者，并使用化学信号联系彼此以防被攻击。

sentences.sentence: As these electrons are negatively charged they will attempt to repel each other.
sentences.translation: 由于这些电子都带负电荷，它们会相互排斥。
